授業目的: The purpose of this course is to provide necessary supervision for students to implement their individual research projects. The students will apply the learned marketing knowledge and research skills to complete a satisfactory report of their chosen topics. Every session will include an interactive discussion on each student’s research process and progress.
到達目標:
1.Students will identify, review and discuss literature relevant to their IR proposal.
2.Students will obtain knowledge of questionnaires design, data collection method, and appropriate analysis of their reports.
3.Students will acquire a deeper understanding of how to organize their research ideas, prepare and revise the contents of the IR report.
4.Students will understand the link of their research findings to existing marketing theory and practice.

トピック.授業計画1:
Every session of this course will focus on each student's research process and progress. Interactive online discussions between each student and the instructor will include:
- Formulating and clarifying each student’s research topic and developing a research plan
- Gathering and reviewing the literature
- Developing a research framework, key constructs, and research design
- Methodology and planning for data collection
- Data analysis and interpretation of result(s)
- Providing guidelines for writing the research report
トピック.授業外学習2: About 190 minutes of self-study per week.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【600】Individual Research　２／Individual Research
担当者: アハマド　ノーリア（AHMAD NORLIA BINTI）
